title: Market a Vacant Rental Unit
description: A property manager needs to market a newly vacant apartment to find a new tenant quickly.

tasks.description: Determine the optimal market rent for the unit by analyzing current listings for comparable units.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets a competitive rental price.

tasks.description: Create a high-quality rental listing with professional photos and a detailed description.
Syndicate the listing to multiple rental websites like Zillow, Trulia, and Apartments.com.
tasks.expected_outcome: The listing is published across all major rental platforms.
